page.title: 14Seed Green Park
page.content: Is an old disused cattle yard and two barns which are now used for hay storage.The yard is used for storing potato and sugarbeet fertilizer.The cattle shed is now the outside of an old farm house, now demolished.The windows of the shed have been bricked up and the only glass that remains is shattered.The barn rooves are missing of tiles and moss grows up the brickwork.The land is overgrown with vegitation.Now owned by THE SEVERN VALLEY SAND & GRAVEL CO. and is rented to Robert Taylor, owner of Larford farm.One barn is new probably built in the early 1950's and used to store potatoes.It has 25 acres in all.The Sand & Gravel company once moved 15ft. of sand and gravel from nearby fields to help the dam in Wales. The B.P.A. British Pipeline Agency own a top secret underground store.(S.Jackson)
